name: Sum 100
description:
MashUp Game Jam ,Theme: SIZE MATTERS

Gameplay:

When the round begins, both players draw until they have 6 cards

The first player can play up to 4 cards. The second player must play as many cards or 1 less/more card

Points will be allocated and the winner keeps points for all cards played.

If there are not enough cards remaining in the deck the game is over.

Each round alternates which player begins.

Scoring:

Points are added left-to-right, any number causing the score to exceed 100 is thrown out.

If both players have the same sum then the winner is determined by:

  • Which sum took less cards.
  • Which sum has the highest single value.

If a player has a higher sum they win unless it is 50 or more points then the lower sum wins instead.

One additional way to win is to have a card in you hand that matches the opponent's sum. This rule can only be used if a player lost but if both players can match each other's score then the original winner is chosen

At the end of the game, the player with the highest sum of collected cards wins.
